section.name: itracker 3.0.2 release-notes - Changes from 3.0.1
section.p: Fixes on JSPs, Workflow-/Project-Scripts configuration in the admin section.

section.name: Migration from 2.4
section.p: This is the first 3.0 bugfix release. There will still be some stuff to fix, so please do testing of essential stuff:

ul.li: use it for internal or less critical projects
try to break it (over the web-interface)
provide feedback on bugs or failures in JIRA please.
